alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 6:21AM AKST until January 12 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with periods of blizzard conditions and freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Ice accumulations of one quarter to one half inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Yukon Delta Coast. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages are possible. Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. Ice will accumulate on many surfaces and could cause power lines to fail. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow with blizzard conditions will develop this morning continue through Friday morning. Freezing rain expected to mix with snow this afternoon into Thursday.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
